turkish_example_sentence: O kalbinde bir huzur hissederse, hemen döner.
english_example_sentence: If he/she feels peace in their heart, they will return immediately.
russian_example_sentence: Если он/она почувствует мир в своем сердце, он/она немедленно вернется.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O kalbinde bir huzur ______, hemen döner.
